header.gameNote: CONTINENTAL TIRE LAS VEGAS INVITATIONAL - CAMPUS GAME

videos.description: UCLA guard Prince Ali pulls up for a 3-pointer and gets fouled for a chance at a four-point play early in the 1st half.
videos.headline: UCLA's Ali sinks 3-pointer plus the foul

videos.description: Chris Smith grabs a rebound and takes it the length of the court for a lay-in plus a foul to give UCLA the lead over Saint Francis in the 1st half.
videos.headline: UCLA's Smith goes coast-to-coast for and-1

videos.description: UCLA guard Kris Wilkes pulls up and drains a 3-pointer to give the Bruins their largest lead of the game over Saint Francis.
videos.headline: UCLA's Wilkes nails 3-pointer in transition
